Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
main.LoginController
public class LoginController extends Object
The LoginController class handles user interactions with the login screen. It validates the user's credentials and transitions to the appropriate screen on successful login.

    Field

  • Method Details

    • handleLoginButtonAction

      private void handleLoginButtonAction()
      Handles the login button action. Validates the username and password and displays an appropriate message. If the login is successful, transitions to the dashboard screen.

    • loadNewScreen

      private void loadNewScreen(String fxmlFile)
      Loads a new screen using the specified FXML file.
      Parameters:
      fxmlFile - the name of the FXML file to load.
